trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A workflow instance may be suspended in one of three ways: the host may call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance, or the workflow runtime engine may suspend the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Uma instância de fluxo de trabalho pode ser suspenso em uma das três maneiras: o host pode chamar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity>atividade pode ser chamada de dentro da instância de fluxo de trabalho, ou o mecanismo de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho pode suspender a instância de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is suspended, the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Quando a instância de fluxo de trabalho é suspenso, o mecanismo de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho gera o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The host may subscribe to this event by adding an event handler to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: O host pode assinar esse evento adicionando um manipulador de eventos para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of why the workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a descrição do motivo pelo qual a instância de fluxo de trabalho foi suspenso.

trans-unit.source: If the host suspends the workflow instance, it supplies a reason for the suspension in the `string` parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se o host suspende a instância de fluxo de trabalho, ele fornece um motivo para a suspensão no `string` parâmetro para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is suspended by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> activity, the reason is supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Se o fluxo de trabalho for suspenso devido a uma <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity>atividade, o motivo é fornecida pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the workflow runtime engine supplies a reason for the suspension.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o mecanismo de tempo de execução do fluxo de trabalho fornece um motivo para a suspensão.

trans-unit.source: The description of why the workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do motivo pelo qual a instância de fluxo de trabalho foi suspenso.
